comments.body: might be slightly tricky but can you check based on the index construction fixture so *all* klasses are convered for checking an in valid keyword shows the deprecation?
None of the others accept kwargs, except for PeriodIndex which checks them (though #38615)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@        with pytest.raises(TypeError, match="Unexpected keyword arguments {'foo'}"):
            with tm.assert_produces_warning(FutureWarning):
                Index([], foo="bar")

    @pytest.mark.xfail(reason="see GH#21311: Index doesn't enforce dtype argument")
